text:
Rediscover magic of Brothers Grimm in Kassel
The brand-new GRIMMWELT attraction on Weinberg hill in Kassel opened its doors to fairytale fans for the very first time on September 4, 2015.
This exhibition on the Brothers Grimm offers a unique and unforgettable journey of discovery, featuring priceless exhibits, audio recordings, activities for children, artistic works and interactive features like the ‘Grimm game’.
A glossary, based on words from the Grimm dictionary, guides visitors through the fascinating exhibition. The glossary refers to three key themes: the world of words, language and books, the world of imagination and imagery, and the actual world in which the Brothers Grimm lived.
Among the treasured Brothers Grimm originals on display are annotated reference copies of the famous ‘Children’s and Household Tales’, which were added to the UNESCO Memory of the World Register in 2005.
Rediscover the magic of these timeless tales and find out more about the literary brothers whose legacy lives on to this day.
